Package com.vincestyling.asqliteplus

The ASQLite+ library makes it easier to constructing SQL statement.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DBOperator<T> This class used to producing a SQL statement by the given entity.
RowMapper<T> An interface used for mapping each row of a Cursor to a result object.
 

Class Summary
DBOverseer This class exposes numerous handy methods to performing SQL statements, to be enable them, create a subclass and pass the SQLiteOpenHelper instance in.
PaginationList<T> An ArrayList with four pagination informations, used to return the SQL's resultset and pagination info as additional.
 

Package com.vincestyling.asqliteplus Description

The ASQLite+ library makes it easier to constructing SQL statement. Also offered numerous handy methods to performing SQL statements in Android SQLite.
